guide.description:
We present to you a new innovative service!
Tired of spending time generating profiles for your clients? ACO's Tool is the solution.

You will be able to let your customer fill out a form with their information in their ticket. To then generate a .json file with these. The tool will ask you how many profiles it should create with the given information, and will jig the addresses, first and last name. The webhook will also be automatically created, integrated, and set up in the ticket in question.

field2.name: Intuitive
field2.value: The customer enters his own information! you just have to import in your bot

field3.name: Faster
field3.value: Generate as many accounts as needed in two clicks, no more copy pasting!

field4.name: J1g
field4.value: Generation of profiles with name, surname and address j1g

field5.name: Webhook management
field5.value: Automatic integration of the webhook in the ticket, with the effigy of the member!

field7.name: Scalable
field7.value: We are attentive and responsive, share your ideas with us!

faq.description: Here are the answers to your questions, if you need help, do not hesitate to contact us!

Comment devenir runner ?.answer: Go to the lounge <#963794793861886032> and click on the register button, a ticket will then be opened.

Comment mettre en place le tool ?.answer: Once your license is activated, you just have to do the `?aco setup` command on your server.

Comment gÃ©nÃ©rer des profils ?.answer: You just need to click on the `Get profile` button once the form is completed, the tool will send you the generated profile.

Mon pays n'est pas le bon, comment le ch.answer: All you have to do is change your country in the form, respecting the format requested by your bot. (ex: FR / France, ...)

Comment changer le webhook ?.answer:
Just type the command `?aco ticket setwebhook` in the ticket, and send the link to the new webhook
Only needed if you want to use a different webhook than the automatically generated one.

Comment reposter le message pour crÃ©er.answer: You just have to type the command `?aco ticket create` the tool will post the message.
